title: It Is The Carnage! (Part 8)
body:
It Is The Carnage! (Part 8)

The red fireball in Clone's hand struck Evan's chest. The moment the fireball struck his chest, Evan subconsciously activated Crimson Veil skill.

---) Crimson Veil (Unique Skill): Using the blood lightning as the medium the user can become partially incorporeal. While in this state, the user can phase through obstacles and attacks. This state will last for fifteen seconds. The power of the user's skills increases by 150% while they are in the partially incorporeal state. Cool down time: Six hours.

He wanted to activate the Titanic Resilience skill as well but he didn't get time to activate it on time.

BOOOOOOOOOOM!

With a loud booming sound, the fireball exploded.

"Arghh" Although Evan had activated the Crimson Veil skill, he was still a step too late and his right shoulder was blasted into smithrness.
